title: Point Blank (Southern Rock) - First 3 Albums 1976-79 @192kbps RE
description:
Point Blank (Southern Rock) - First 3 Albums 1976-79 @192kbps

RESEED - PLEASE USE THIS FILE

Point Blank is one of the finest Southern Rock Bands from the Seventies. They formed in 1974 in Texas and recorded 6 Albums until 1981, evetually having one succesfull hit with 'Nicole' in the USA 1981.


Line Up:
Rusty Burns - Guitar 
Kim Davis - Guitar 
John O'Daniel - Vocals 
Buzzy Gruen - Drums 
Phillip Petty - Bass 

from 1979 on Philip Petty has been replaced and keyboards have been added to the band:

1979:
Steve Hardin - Keyboards 
Bill Randolph - Bass

The Torrent includes the first three Albums of the Band, at 192kbs
